languages.text: "Помните, что нет у вас иного владыки, кроме меня. Тем, кто посмеет забыть это, вопли демонов варпа покажутся детским лепетом, а клинки ксеносов — нежной периной. Настолько страшна будет кара!"

traits.locale_text: "Помните, что нет у вас иного владыки, кроме меня. Тем, кто посмеет забыть это, вопли демонов варпа покажутся детским лепетом, а клинки ксеносов — нежной периной. Настолько страшна будет кара!"

languages.text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"
languages.original_text: "Помните, что нет у вас иного владыки, кроме меня. Тем, кто посмеет забыть это, вопли демонов варпа покажутся детским лепетом, а клинки ксеносов — нежной периной. Настолько страшна будет кара!"

traits.locale_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

"Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

"Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

"Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

languages.text: “要记住，除了我之外，你们没有别的统治者。如果有谁敢忘记这一点，我就要让他们尝到恐怖的刑罚！与我的刑罚相比，亚空间恶魔的嚎叫声就像婴儿的牙牙学语，异形的利刃相比之下就像柔软的羽毛床一样！”
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: “要记住，除了我之外，你们没有别的统治者。如果有谁敢忘记这一点，我就要让他们尝到恐怖的刑罚！与我的刑罚相比，亚空间恶魔的嚎叫声就像婴儿的牙牙学语，异形的利刃相比之下就像柔软的羽毛床一样！”

languages.text: «Recuerden que no tienen más gobernante que yo. Y si alguien lo olvida, ¡los aullidos de los daemons de la disformidad parecerán los balbuceos de un bebé y las cuchillas de los xenos serán suaves como un colchón de plumas en comparación con el terror del castigo que haré caer sobre ellos!».
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: «Recuerden que no tienen más gobernante que yo. Y si alguien lo olvida, ¡los aullidos de los daemons de la disformidad parecerán los balbuceos de un bebé y las cuchillas de los xenos serán suaves como un colchón de plumas en comparación con el terror del castigo que haré caer sobre ellos!».

languages.text: 「覚えておけ、統治者は私をおいて他にない。恐れを知らずこれを忘れるものは誰であろうと、罰を与えよう。その恐怖に比べれば、歪みのディーモンの遠吠えは幼児のおしゃべりに、異種族の刃は柔らかな羽毛ベッドに感じられるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: 「覚えておけ、統治者は私をおいて他にない。恐れを知らずこれを忘れるものは誰であろうと、罰を与えよう。その恐怖に比べれば、歪みのディーモンの遠吠えは幼児のおしゃべりに、異種族の刃は柔らかな羽毛ベッドに感じられるだろう！」

languages.text: "Vergesst nicht, dass Ihr neben mir keinen anderen Herrscher habt. Wer es doch wagt, das zu vergessen, den werde ich bestrafen, und im Vergleich dazu wird das Heulen der Dämonen aus dem Warp für ihn klingen wie Babygebrabbel, und Xenos-Klingen werden einem weichen Daunenbett gleichen!"
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst nicht, dass Ihr neben mir keinen anderen Herrscher habt. Wer es doch wagt, das zu vergessen, den werde ich bestrafen, und im Vergleich dazu wird das Heulen der Dämonen aus dem Warp für ihn klingen wie Babygebrabbel, und Xenos-Klingen werden einem weichen Daunenbett gleichen!"

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas que je suis votre {mf|seul|seule} et unique {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. Et pour ceux qui choisiraient de l'oublier, sachez que les horreurs que je vous ferai subir feront passer les hurlements des démons du Warp pour des babillages et les lames des xénos pour de simples chatouillements de plumes ! »
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas que je suis votre {mf|seul|seule} et unique {mf|dirigeant|dirigeante}. Et pour ceux qui choisiraient de l'oublier, sachez que les horreurs que je vous ferai subir feront passer les hurlements des démons du Warp pour des babillages et les lames des xénos pour de simples chatouillements de plumes ! »

languages.text: "Benden başka hükümdarınız olmadığını unutmayın. Bunu unutmaya cesaret edenlere biçeceğim cezanın dehşetine kıyasla öteboyuttan gelen iblislerin ulumaları, bebek agulaması gibi gelecek; zeno bıçakları ise kuş tüyü yatak misali etkisiz kalacaktır!"
languages.original_text: "Remember that you have no other ruler but me. For any who dare to forget this, the howls of daemons from the warp will sound like the babbling of babes, and xenos blades will seem like a soft feather bed compared to the horror of the punishment I'll inflict!"

traits.locale_text: "Benden başka hükümdarınız olmadığını unutmayın. Bunu unutmaya cesaret edenlere biçeceğim cezanın dehşetine kıyasla öteboyuttan gelen iblislerin ulumaları, bebeklerin gevezelikleri gibi gelecek ve zeno bıçakları, kuş tüyü yatak gibi görünecek!"
